name: 2 Games in 1 Double Pack: SpongeBob SquarePants - Battle for Bikini Bottom / Nicktoons: Freeze Frame Frenzy
summary: 2 Games in 1 Double Pack: SpongeBob SquarePants: Battle for Bikini Bottom + Nicktoons: Freeze Frame Frenzy is a bundle developed by Vicarious Visions and published by THQ released on September 20, 2004. It contains SpongeBob SquarePants: Battle for Bikini Bottom and Nicktoons: Freeze Frame Frenzy
